All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEventDialogFragment
AddEventDialogFragment is a dialog fragment for adding events.
AddEventDialogFragment.AddEventDialogListener
Interface for communicating with the parent activity to pass event details.
AddEventDialogFragment.ImageUploadCallback
Interface for handling image upload callbacks.
AddFacilityDialogFragment
AddFacilityDialogFragment is a dialog fragment that allows users to add a new facility or edit an existing one.
AddFacilityDialogFragment.FacilityUpdateListener
An interface for notifying the listener when facility data is updated.
AdminListActivity
AdminListActivity handles the display of various lists (facilities, events, profiles, or images) based on user selection.
AdminListActivityTest
 
CaptureAct
CaptureAct is a simple extension of the CaptureActivity from the JourneyApps Barcode Scanner library.
CustomEntrantAdapter
The CustomEntrantAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying entrant information in a ListView.
CustomEntrantAdminAdapter
CustomEntrantAdminAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter designed to manage and display a list of entrants with administrative options such as viewing, modifying, or deleting an entrant's details.
CustomEventAdapter
CustomEventAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying and interacting with events in a ListView.
CustomFacilityAdapter
CustomFacilityAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying and interacting with facilities in a ListView.
CustomFolderAdapter
 
EditEventDialogFragment
EditEventDialogFragment is a dialog fragment for editing events.
EditEventDialogFragment.EditEventDialogListener
Interface for communicating with the parent activity to pass event details.
EditEventDialogFragment.ImageUploadCallback
Interface for handling image upload callbacks.
editUserActivity
Activity to edit the user's profile information.
EditUserActivityTest
 
EnlistConfirmationActivity
EnlistConfirmationActivity displays a confirmation message to the user after they have enlisted or removed themselves from an event's waitlist.
Entrant
Represents an entrant with personal details and preferences.
EntrantEnlistActivity
The EntrantEnlistActivity class handles the user interface and logic for enlisting in or leaving an event's waiting list.
EntrantEnlistActivityTest
 
EntrantHomePageActivity
The EntrantHomePageActivity class provides a user interface for displaying a list of events available to entrants.
EntrantTest
 
Event
Represents an event with various attributes such as name, date, facility, and more.
Event.EventAddCallback
Interface for callback after adding an event to Firestore.
EventActivity
EventActivity manages the displaying and interactions of organizer events.
EventDetailActivity
The EventDetailActivity class provides a detailed view of a selected event.
EventDetailActivity.NotificationMessageCallback
Callback interface for notification message input.
EventEntrantsActivity
EventEntrantsActivity displays a list of entrants for a specific event.
EventEntrantsTests
 
EventFunctionalityTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
Facility
Represents a facility in the application with essential details like name, location, email, description, capacity, and the ID of the organizer managing the facility.
HeaderNavigation
The HeaderNavigation class handles navigation within the application by setting up listeners for various header components, including events, facilities, organizing, notifications, home, and profile.
ImageGridActivity
ImageGridActivity displays a grid of images retrieved from Firebase Storage.
ImageGridAdapter
ImageGridAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter for displaying images in a grid layout.
ImageGridAdapter.OnProfileURLGenerated
Interface for handling profile picture URL generation callbacks.
lotteryAcceptDenyTest
 
MainActivity
Main activity that initiates the application and directs users based on their profile status.
ManageFacilityActivity
The ManageFacilityActivity class allows organizers to manage their facility details.
MapActivity
MapActivity displays a map with markers representing the locations of entrants for a specific event.
MyApp
 
userProfileActivity
Activity to display the user's profile information.
UserProfileActivityTest
